question: A uniform electric field <katex>$E=3 \times 10^{5} \text{ NC}^{-1}$</katex> is acting along the positive Y-axis. The electric flux through a rectangle of area <katex>$10 \text{ cm} \times 30 \text{ cm}$</katex> whose plane is parallel to the Z-X plane is
explanation: Area vector <katex>$\vec{A}$</katex> is perpendicular to the Z-X plane, so it is along the Y-axis.
